boardgame.name: I Counted Them All Out (formerly)
Where There Is Discord: War in the South Atlantic
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Where there is discord... may we bring harmony._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; -- Margaret Thatcher, quoting a prayer ascribed to St. Francis of Assisi_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At 16.28 hours on the afternoon of Saturday, 1 May 1982, an AIM-9L Sidewinder missile fired from the Sea Harrier of Royal Naval Air Squadron Flight Lieutenant Paul Barton struck the Mirage III of Lieutenant Carlos Perona of Fuerza Aerea Argentina, destroying it on impact. The Falkland/Malvinas War had begun in earnest._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Over the next 45 days, the armed forces of the United Kingdom and Argentina locked in a deadly struggle, as both attempted to assert their right to govern a small, inhospitable South Atlantic island unknown to most of the world and to many of those fighting over her._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; In this solitaire military simulation boardgame, you have the opportunity to recreate those fateful summer days, commanding the British Task Force as it attempts to defend itself from concerted attacks by Argentine air and naval forces, and mount a successful amphibious landing on the disputed islands. You will have to manage and deploy the Royal Navy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s limited Sea Harrier assets, coordinate the defence of the fleet with a wide range of vessels and weapons systems, and plan a landing strategy that enables you to consolidate a bridgehead before Argentine forces can respond. Modeled closely on historical events, you will confront issues including variable rules of engagement, surveillance and intelligence gathering, submarine warfare, Argentine carrier and surface fleet operations, the Exocet missile threat, third-party operational support and interference, fleet logistics, supply interdiction, and uncooperative weather. At the same time you will have to walk the tightrope of public opinion, deal with _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;oversight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; from the politicians back in London, and overcome unforeseen events ranging from the sabotage of supply lines up to orders to take the fight to the mainland._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Will the Falklands remain in British hands, or will the Malvinas return to Argentina? Their fate is in your hands.._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2009 Charles S. Roberts Best Post-WW2 Era Board Wargame Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 30: The games that got away
I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 50: Joel Toppen

listing.notes: Willing to sell in mint condition. The price is based on what I paid from 5th column for just the game: $92.91 shipping additional $10 via USPS Total cost $102.91 When check clears will send game. Thanks!

Opened but 100% complete and never played. In great condition. I really hate to sell it but recently lost my job... ; ( Payment: Paypal required within 48 hours of confirmation. Shipping: For shipping quotes, use www.USPS.com with a weight of 7.1 pounds (too big for flat-rate box) and a box size of 17 x 13 x 6 from zip code 85029. For US, I can use Parcel Post or Priority Mail. For International (even Canada) I can only use Priority Mail.

New still in loose bag/shrink, some minor damage to bag/shrink, see photo. http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/598741 Box is a large and non standard size and game is quite heavy, this will be reflected in the shipping costs.

Still in original unopened shipping package -- you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be the first to open. Ship to lower 48 US States only. Package is heavy (7+ lbs). $15 shipping is for UPS Ground or USPS Parcel Post ... any other method at buyer cost (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also refund excess shipping costs if less than $15).
Game has been played twice. It is in excellent condition.

Played the first few turns twice. Cards are not sleeved but barely touched. All components bagged, counters are in two GMT counter trays. Everything still in excellent condition, including the box. Contact me for shipping costs, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s quite a heavy game! :-) Reserved for leroy43
Excellent condition - played once from new. £5 postage within UK.
It has slight damage on the box and a tiny bit of damage on the side of the board not noticeable when playing, but is unpunched and cards are still sealed.

Game has been played two times, all components are present, very good condition. First edition, all components in English. Shipping will be € 6,90 to Germany or € 17 to the rest of Europe via DHL, insurance included. Payment wither via PayPal or (international) bank transfer.
This has not been played and is in excellent condition although it has been opened.

Played only a few games - all components in excellent condition . Photo attached Please note my price INCLUDES shipping in Canada and USA - this is a deal as this is a BIG game. I have a positive Ebay rating under name : deifen_baker

New, complete, just opened: all components in new conditions. Shipping is pacco J+3 and 11 euros to Italy. For any other destination please send a mail and I will quote the cost (which is high).The item is heavy, more than 3 kg. Thanks for looking.
I pay UK postage Game as new

Opened and punched but not played. Box has a ripped corner but it came that way. This is a great game but it takes up way to much space for my small apartment. The price includes shipping and is equal to what I paid for it (30 dollars shipping and 100 for the base game). I will only ship to US addresses. I can ship until the 23rd of Dec and then again after the 3rd of the New Year.

This game is used and has been played twice. The components are great. Every time I look at this beautiful game I have second thoughts about selling it ... Note, the box has some wear on the corners and one of the corners of the lower box is split from shipping and one of the map corners dinged. Doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect play but I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want anyone to be disappointed. Will try to get some pictures up soonest.
The game is complete with light box wear. It was played one time to learn the rules. There is a small tear on one of the corners - please see the photos below.

Complete and in excellent condition (only played a small handful of times) listed as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Very Good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; for the following reasons: 1. The box lid is split on one corner, although it is quite a tidy split and could easily be carefully repaired (it was somehow damaged during shipping from Fifth Column Games). Photos available upon request. 2. The back of the map boards are slightly scuffed. Again, photos available upon request. Other than this the games is complete and all other components are in excellent condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to ship worldwide however please note that the buyer will have to pay for postage and shipping outside of the UK can get a bit expensive. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also open to sensible offers on the price. Please feel free to contact me if you have any queries. Thanks for looking.

Game is unplayed (counters have been punched, but all components including box, board, rules booklets, counters and cards are as new). Item is heavy - will provide postage cost details before sending but am also ok for game to be collected if convenient ! Please email me if you require any further details. Thanks for browsing

Punched, but barely touched. One corner of the bottom of the box is starting to split, but the cover of the box looks great. I will package this up well and will send a shipping cost quote once I know the actual shipping cost.
Item won by aaxiom during a short and sweet Geekbay auction. Only aaxiom may buy the game.
Still unpunched and cards in shrink, just the box is opened

If you are attending the games expo in Birmingham (June) we can arrange to meet up and avoid any P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P costs (pre-payment required)

No precinct but tiles unpunched and components never used. All the components, tiles, dices, box and manuals in perfect condition, like new. Punched and played 3 times. In very good to excellent condition, box solid with all corners intact. Cards sleeved (included). Counters were sprayed with a matt finish. Helps to protect them from fingers, and cuts down glare. Cheap shipping in USA only. Sorry

Game is punched but has never been played. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m lucky enough to have a friend who also owns this game so i really don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need my copy. engl. Version CAREFUL: This is a big and heavy box and might costs a little more to ship!!!
Unplayed, uncpunched (except 6 tiles that have come loose), the boards are slightly warped at the ends. Stored in smokefree home at room temperature. Game is reserved for specific buyer.
Never removed from original packaging

Game is in new condition. I opened the box it was shipped in to make sure it wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t beat up in transport. Since it was not shrink wrapped I opened it up and confirmed contents. One bit has fallen out of the sprues (still included), but everything else is unpunched. This will be shipping in the box it came in, plus another box - so including the game box you will have a collection. I charge actual shipping + insurance and will ship by whatever means you want. Feel free to GM me with questions or if you would like pictures. I will combine shipping, so please check out my other items for sale!
Punched, played 3 times. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a huge beast.

Complete, components in great shape. The box bottom, however, has two partially split corners. The box tops has one partially split corner, a small ding, and some scuffing. Shipping is $15. Combined shipping rates are available when purchasing multiple items.

A brand new unused, and undamaged game in perfect condition. The original packaging and all materials are in brand new condition. Factory shrink wrap was not used by the manufacturer but the game will contain packing peanuts to help protect it during transit and also be wrapped in bubble wrap for added protection to that of the original mailing box. All reasonable offers will be considered. Delivery charges: UK Special Delivery including full insurance £15. Outside of the UK the shipping cost will be very expensive due to the weight - please geekmail. Buyer responsible for all Customs charges. Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs, postage for Europe and the rest of the world is by airmail with delivery confirmation/tracking. I can combine multiple purchases to reduce shipping costs where possible. UK buyers can send a personal cheque or use paypal all others must use paypal.

Brand new in original shrinkwrap. First printing.
Box top has minor shelf wear and some bowing. Box bottom has some bowing on the sides. All else is excellent and unpunched.

Unpunched. No damage.
Opened but unplayed in excellent condition

Unpunched. HOWEVER 4 COUNTERS HAVE POPPED OUT OF THE COUNTERSHEETS. Baggied and included. Everything else looks like it came straight from the factory. Contents minty fresh. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship on multiple purchases.

No shipping costs for Germany! All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). We offer only goods that we have in stock. We ship worldwide – please ask for a quote about exact shipping costs (rest assured that we always try to keep them as low as possible). Payment may be made by Paypal or bank transfer in advance. For orders above €50 we grant a discount of €5 on shipping costs. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). Our Terms and Conditions 1. General All transactions between Gamers HQ and you, the customer, are subject to the following conditions, which you acknowledge by accepting delivery of your ordered products. These conditions do not affect your statutory rights and in all cases German law applies. 2. Orders and prices We do our level best to ensure that the information on our website is up-to-date. Please note that offers and prices are subject to change. We work to ensure that our prices are all correct, but cannot be held responsible for accidentally displaying the wrong price of a product. All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes. 3. Lead times and delivery costs Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction. Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros. Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs. 4. Payment options We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. Once you have placed three orders, we also offer you the option to pay by invoice. Such privileges can, however, be withdrawn should we encounter repeated delays in settling invoices. 5. Cancellations, Refunds _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Returns Should you wish to cancel your order, you can do so by notifying us by fax, email, letter or by simply returning your product(s) to Gamers HQ. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification. Please ensure that any products returned are in good condition. If you check the products in a manner that you will have done, for example, in a shop, this is fine. Any other handling of the product(s) might entitle Gamers HQ to some compensation from you, which might in rare cases amount to the original sum paid for the product(s). So should you feel that you might cancel your order by returning the products, please limit your inspection of the products to optical checks and do not use them on a regular basis. If you return your order within two weeks in the above manner, we shall refund you the costs for sending the product(s) back to us (unless your cancelled order amounts less than 20 euros, in which case you as the customer will bear the cost of return postage). Please ensure that you use appropriate packing material when sending back the product(s) — preferably using the original wrapping. Please note that German law, following the EU directive 97/7/EG of 20 May 1997, specifies that the right to return items and receive a full refund is not applicable to the purchase of newspapers, magazines or journals (§312d BGB) as well as the purchase of audio- or video-recordings and software once you have broken the seal of the package. Should we accidently send you the wrong products, please return them to us and we shall refund you the return postage immediately. Any cancellation of an order has to be done in writing (by post, fax or email). 6. Ownership Please note that ordered products remain our property until you have fully paid for them. 7. Personal data We are committed to protecting your personal information and will keep the information you entrust to us safely and securely. We may collect information from you to monitor website visitor patterns, so that we can improve our website. We also collect information from you to handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments, communicate with you about orders, products and services, update our records and generally maintain your customer profile with us. However, we shall never sell or share your personal information with third parties. Our customer data — in so far as required to provide the above services and within the limits defined by the data protection laws of Germany (paragraph 26 BDSG) — is saved and handled on a separate, network-independent computer. 8. Other matters We reserve the right to reject orders without any explanation. Also please note that you as a customer cannot assert a claim against Gamers HQ if, for whatever reason, we are unable to source the item(s) you have ordered. Such cases arise only very exceptionally; we try to ensure that everything we advertise in our web shop is in stock. Where, for whatever reason, we are unable to deliver we promptly refund in full everything you have paid. 9. Limitation of liability: external links Although we check the content of external links provided on our website, we have no control over or responsibility for these domains to which we provide the links or which link to us. That responsibility solely rests with those who manage the respective domains. 10. Place of jurisdiction Any disputes arising hereunder will be settled before a Berlin court. We reserve the right to choose the customer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s place of jurisdiction instead. 11. Severability clause If parts of these terms and conditions become ineffective, the remainder of these terms still apply. Keine Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands! Innerhalb Deutschlands gilt: Alle Spiele sind Neuware und in Orginalverpackung . Alle Preise sind inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer von 7% bzw. 19%. Die Versandkosten betragen 5,00 € innerhalb Deutschlands, bzw. weniger (z.B. Scenariobände, Magazine). Ab einem Bestellwert von 50,00 € fallen keine Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands an! Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Wenn ihr noch irgendwelche Fragen habt, ruft uns an (030 79706126), schickt uns ne Mail (laden@gamers-hq.de) oder besucht unsere Homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). AGB: 1. Allgemeines Alle Transaktionen zwischen dem Gamers HQ und seinen Kunden unterliegen ausschließlich den nachfolgenden Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen und basieren auf der Grundlage des Rechts der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Diese AGB gelten mit der Annahme der Sendung des Gamers-HQ als anerkannt. 2. Auftragsannahme und Preise Alle Angebote und Preise sind freibleibend; Liefermöglichkeit vorbehalten. Preisänderungen, auch ohne Ankündigung, oder Irrtümer sind jederzeit vorbehalten. Alle Preisangaben sind in Euro und inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer. 3. Lieferung Alle Lieferungen erfolgen ab dem Gamers-HQ. Alle Lieferungen erfolgen auf Rechnung des Käufers. In der Regel liefern wir mit DHL, in besonderen Fällen kann davon abgewichen werden. Die Entscheidung hierüber liegt beim Gamer´s HQ. Alle Bestellung werden normalerweise innerhalb von 2 Werktagen verschickt. Teillieferungen gelten als jeweils separates Geschäft. Der Versand erfolgt ab einem Rechnungsbetrag von Euro 50,- € innerhalb Deutschlands versandkostenfrei. Bei Bestellungen unter diesem Betrag erheben wir innerhalb Deutschlands eine Versandkostengebühr von Euro 5,-€. 4. Zahlungsbedingungen Wir bieten standartmäßig 3 Möglichkeiten der Bezahlung an: Per Bankeinzug, Vorkasse oder per PayPal .Nach der dritten Bestellung räumen wir unseren Kunden auch die Möglichkeit des Kaufs auf Rechnung ein, wir sind jedoch befugt, diese Möglichkeit bei mehrmaligem Zahlungsverzug auch wieder zu widerrufen. 5. Rückgaberecht Sie können ohne Angabe von Gründen durch Erklärung per Fax, E-Mail oder einfaches Briefschreiben oder durch Rücksendung unserer Waren eine Bestellung widerrufen. Für die Absendung der Widerrufserklärung oder unserer Waren ist eine Widerrufsfrist von zwei Wochen einzuhalten, die mit Eingang unserer Lieferung bei Ihnen beginnt. Ein Widerrufsrecht steht Ihnen - auch innerhalb der Widerrufsfrist - in keinem Fall bei folgenden Waren zu: - Audio- oder Videoaufzeichnungen bzw. Software, wenn Sie die entsprechenden Datenträger entsiegelt haben, - Zeitungen, Zeitschriften und Illustrierten. Unsere Ware ist sofort nach der fristgerechten Ausübung des Widerrufsrechts auf unsere Kosten und Gefahr an uns zurückzusenden, wenn der Widerruf nicht bereits durch Rücksendung ausgeübt wurde. Achten Sie bitte bei der Rücksendung darauf, dass Sie eine geeignete Verpackung benutzen, vorzugsweise die Originalverpackung. Ausnahmsweise sind die Kosten der Rücksendung von Ihnen zu tragen, wenn der Rechnungswert unserer Ware nicht mehr als Euro 20,00 beträgt. In keinem Fall haben Sie die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, wenn die von uns gelieferte Ware nicht der bestellten Ware entspricht. Sollten Sie bereits den Kaufpreis für die Ware bezahlt haben, werden wir diesen nach einem Widerruf unverzüglich zurückerstatten. Wenn Sie unsere Ware nach dem Widerruf ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurücksenden, sind Sie uns gesetzlich zu Wertersatz verpflichtet. Das gilt nicht, soweit Sie unsere Ware lediglich so geprüft haben, wie Sie es z.B. im Ladengeschäft hätten tun können. Jede darüber hinausgehende Nutzung der Ware berechtigt uns jedoch zu Ersatzansprüchen, die unter Umständen die Höhe des Kaufpreises erreichen können. Sollten Sie also einen Widerruf in Betracht ziehen, beschränken Sie sich möglichst auf eine optische Prüfung und nehmen Sie die Ware nicht regulär in Gebrauch. 6. Eigentumsvorbehalt Gelieferte Artikel bleiben bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung Eigentum der Firma Gamers-HQ. 7. Datenspeicherung Unsere Kundendaten – soweit geschäftsnotwendig und im Rahmen des Bundesdatenschutzgesetzes (Paragraph 26 BDSG) zulässig – werden EDV-mäßig gespeichert und verarbeitet (auf einem netzexternen Rechner). Kundendaten werden unter keinen Umständen Dritten zur Verfügung gestellt. 8. Sonstiges Die Ablehnung von Aufträgen, auch ohne Angaben von Gründen, behalten wir uns ausdrücklich vor. Aus Lieferschwierigkeiten unsererseits erwachsen keinerlei Ansprüche gegen das Gamers-HQ. Können Bestellungen aus irgendwelchen Gründen nicht ausgeführt werden, werden bereits geleistete Zahlungen umgehend zurückerstattet. 9. Haftungshinweis Trotz sorgfältiger inhaltlicher Kontrolle übernehmen wir keine Haftung für die Inhalte externer Links. Für den Inhalt der verlinkten Seiten sind ausschließlich deren Betreiber verantwortlich. 10. Gerichtsstand Erfüllungsort und Gerichtsstand ist für beide Teile Berlin. Nach unserer Wahl kann auch am allgemeinen Gerichtsstand des Kunden geklagt werden. 11. Salvatorische Klausel Die Unwirksamkeit einzelner Bestimmungen berührt die Gültigkeit der Geschäftsbedingungen im übrigen nicht.

Only opened to inspect contents, although one of the counters fell of and it is now inside a ziplog bag. Abierto únicamente para inspeccionar su contenido, el juego está nuevo, las cartas precintadas y todas las fichas, a excepción de una, en sus hojas. La ficha suelta está guardada en una bolsita de plástico. Para quienes duden de si existen diferencias entre las diversas reimpresiones, la respuesta es no: El juego publicado en 2009 es exactamente el mismo que en sus reimpresiones de 2010 y 2014. El pago se efectuaría por transferencia o ingreso bancario. Otra opción es el pago contra reembolso, pero esto encarece el envío y supongo que acaba siendo más caro que la comisión por transferencia bancaria. Existe la posibilidad de pagar por Paypal, pero el comprador debe hacerse cargo de la comisión (4% del total del producto + coste del envío). El envío se realizaría a través de Correos. Advierto que se trata de un paquete pesado. El envío por Kiala (kiala.es) es otra opción más económica y cómoda que dependerá del comprador, pero que recomiendo.
